page.title: 09The Brownies
page.content: Brownies is a popular girls' club: the {uniform}is a{brown dress, yellow tie and a{bobble hat}.After three weeks {you}get enrolled at Brownies. That night you have to stand by a mirror and say."Twist me and turn me and show me the elf, I looked in the water and there saw myself".Then you look for a badge and take it to the{pack leader {(Brown Owl)}and say,{"I promise that I {will do my best to do my duty to God, {to serve the Queen and help other {people and to keep the Brownie Guide {law".}Then she gives you your badges. At Brownies you play a lot of games and learn lots of songs. When you leave Brownies at 10 years you can join the Guides. There are several Cub packs and Scout Troops for boys in Exmouth to join if they want to.
